Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for applying for our fuel card program!

Feel free to give me a call at {!User.Phone} if you have any questions.
Sincerely,
{!User.FirstName} {!User.LastName} {!User.Title} Phone - {!User.Phone} Fax - {!User.Fax} {!User.Email}
